summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Alley in Block Twenty (20) Capitol Hill Addition Div. \#2 in the City of Seattle, by grading and paving under Ordinance No. 23101, creating Local Improvement District No. 2264 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
